org.smartfrog.tools.ant
Class SecurityHolder

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.tools.ant.SecurityHolder

public class SecurityHolder
extends java.lang.Object

Holder class for security for any task that needs it. This keeps all the logic in one place. Simply provide delegate methods to addSecurity(org.smartfrog.tools.ant.Security) amd setSecurityRef(org.apache.tools.ant.types.Reference). Call getSecurity(org.apache.tools.ant.Task) to get the security reference. Date: 19-Apr-2004 Time: 17:11:46
